setup: Let's get you set up! Please fill in your details to register.
first-name-not-empty: First name must not be empty
first-name-max-char: First name must have at most 30 characters
last-name-not-empty: Last name must not be empty
last-name-max-char: Last name must have at most 30 characters
email-max-char: Email must have at most 100 characters
password-regex: Password must have at least 8 characters, 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, 1 number and 1 special character
